text:
Just +1'ing this feedback.

Ability to import custom functions / modules / files

<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C011F74BKQW/p1714750321318679>

Hi all, I'm not sure if I should post this question here, but as it's CRM related I'm writing it here.
Currently we have the need/question: is it possible to configure in the profile of a Lead, in the prospecting workspace - Leads section, a button with the same functionality that we have in a CRM card of Contacts?
I have not found anything in the documentation, but as it is a relatively new functionality I preferred to ask you first.

Thank you.

This isn't currently possible, but I've also asked the team for the ability to add buttons to this action bar before as well. I used to have a chrome extensions for updating the HTML of the page and creating new buttons but I replaced them all with React Cards

Thanks for your reply Carter, it's a pity it can't be configured natively. I have in the Contacts section a card to connect to my internal API and the Sales guys would like to be able to access the same without having to switch from Leads to Contacts.
I hope they introduce a configuration feature in the future.
Hi Joshua! Yes, we are actively working on this. High chances that this will be ready within a month's time. Will keep you updated on the timeline here:+1:

Hi Prasad,
Let me know if I'm understanding this correctly. You're trying to center the  :large_green_circle: and "$0.00" in the screenshot under the headings. Is that correct?
